title: [Large-Scale] Workshop on Integrated Earth Science and Language Instructional Design Using the 5E Instructional Model

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding fundamental concepts of earth science and basic knowledge of language education
context.additional_context: Enhancing instructional design capabilities for integrating Earth science content into language education for practicing professionals

learning_goals: Improvement of ability to design Earth science lessons according to the 5E instructional model phases (achieving 80% or higher)
Acquisition of skills to develop and critically apply teaching materials using generative AI (ChatGPT)
Design of Earth science-language integrated activities aligned with learner levels and curriculum standards
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
